quotes: 2011. He was the first Prime Minister since 2006 to hold the position for more than a year.
He was the first Prime Minister since 2006 to hold the position for more than a year.
in August 2012. He became a member of a special UN group.
This group worked on plans for global development goals after 2015.
Naoto Kan was born in Ube, Yamaguchi, Japan, on October 10, 1946.
Kan studied at the Tokyo Institute of Technology and graduated in 1970.
The next year, in 1971, he became a licensed benrishi.
He ran in elections in 1976, 1977, and 1979 but did not win.
Finally, in 1980, he won a seat in the lower house of the Diet.
In 1996, Naoto Kan became the Minister of Health and Welfare.
Kan with members of the First Hashimoto Cabinet at the Prime Minister's Official Residence on 11 January 1996.
